Description:
Identifies when a owner is was removed from a application or service principal in Azure.

Author: Austin Songer @austinsonger
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Azure Owner Removed From Application or Service Principal
Query: sourcetype="azure-activitylogs" (properties.message="Remove owner from service principal" OR properties.message="Remove owner from application")
